description: The nobleman Gundam Fighter who represents the space colony of Neo France. When Earth`s elites left the planet to dwell in the colonies, the de Sand family remained behind to guard their homeland, and George sees himself as a knight upholding his family`s honorable tradition. Chivalrous and sportsmanlike to a fault, George is also a master fencer, whose swordsmanship is unrivaled even among the other Gundam Fighters.
name: George de Sand
